sentences.en: Another carriage having already gone from here today, it might awaken suspicion. "
sentences.cn: 今天已经从这儿走了一辆车,再走一辆车会引起疑心的. ”

sentences.en: Are you going to awaken her?
Bill slept a little until he was awakened to take his turn on guard.
sentences.cn: 比尔睡了一会儿，直到被叫醒去换岗。

sentences.en: Dharma is to awaken the spiritual consciousness and purify the soul.
sentences.cn: 佛法,就是要你唤醒良知,涤净灵魂.

sentences.en: Early involvement in music can awaken an interest that will last a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 早接触音乐可以激起终生的兴趣。

sentences.en: Even the fall of France in May 1940 failed to awaken us.
sentences.cn: 一九四○年五月法国的沦陷,犹未使我们惊醒.

sentences.en: He felt his body awaken excitedly, his senses swim.
sentences.cn: 他感到自己周身兴奋激动, 神智飘荡.

sentences.en: He must awaken to the fact that failure means dismissal.
sentences.cn: 他必须意识到失败了就要被免职.

sentences.en: Insects awaken soon after the first day of spring.
sentences.cn: 立春之后,很快就到了惊蛰.

sentences.en: Its scenes are part of our life; its aspects awaken the tenderest feelings of affection.
sentences.cn: 它的景物是我们生活的一部分; 它的外观唤起极温柔的爱情.

sentences.en: Old people awaken early in the morning.
She was awakened by a noise at two in the morning.
sentences.cn: 凌晨两点，她被一个声音吵醒。

sentences.en: Teachers awaken young minds, and teachers encourage ingenuity and unleash fertile imaginations.
sentences.cn: 老师唤醒年轻头脑, 并且老师鼓励机巧和解开肥沃想像力.

sentences.en: The British never awaken to peril until it is almost too late.
sentences.cn: 英国人从来不懂得防患于未然。

sentences.en: They were making enough noise to awaken the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们发出的声音大得能把死人吵醒.

sentences.en: This helped for awaken in him a longing for knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这帮助引起了他的求知欲.

sentences.en: Unfortunately, Grandma always seems to awaken at awkward moments.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，奶奶好像总是醒来的不是时候。

words.tran_cn: 觉醒，意识到；醒来；被唤起

trans.tran_en: if something awakens an emotion, interest, memory etc it makes you suddenly begin to feel that emotion etc
